text: Amtali () is an Upazila of Barguna District in Bangladesh. It is a part of the Barisal Division. The area is 720.76 km2. ==Administration== Amtali Upazila is divided into Amtali Municipality and eight union parishads. The list of union parishads: List of Union Parishad of Amtali Upazila. No. Name of the Union 1 Amtali 2 Arpangasia 3 Athrogasia 4 Chotobogi 5 Chowra 6 Gulishakhali 7 Haldia 8 Kukua Amtali Municipality is subdivided into 9 wards and 14 mahallas. ==References== Category:Upazilas of Barguna District
title: Amtali Upazila
